name: REMEDY Australian Tea Tree Oil - 100ml
description: Tea tree oil has been proven to be a powerful yet natural antiseptic, antiviral and antifungal medicine. It is the perfect remedy for infections, cuts, scrapes, burns & bites and effective against nail fungus & athletes foot.

name: REMEDY Organic Lemon Oil - 100ml
description: Our organic lemon oil has stimulating, detoxifying, astringent & antiseptic qualities, and is the perfect remedy for stress disorders, skin & hair disorders, fever, infections, asthma, insomnia & a healthy immune system.

name: REMEDY Gentle Lavender Oil - 100ml
description: Our lavender oil is a calming tonic which is the perfect remedy for nerves, migraines & headaches, anxiety, depression, nervous tension, emotional stress and insomnia as well as pains caused by sore muscles.

name: REMEDY Gentle Sweet Almond Oil - 100ml
description: Featuring a light, sweet, nutty aroma, our gentle sweet almond oil is easily absorbed & is wonderful for protecting and nourishing the skin, leaving it feeling soft & satiny smooth.

name: REMEDY 100% Organic Rosehip Oil - 100ml
description: Rich in vitamin C, omega-3 & omega-6, our cold pressed organic rosehip oil is the perfect remedy for rejuvenating dry, tired skin, offering a natural treatment for early signs of aging, scar tissue & eczema.

name: REMEDY 100% Organic Remedy Skin - 100g
description: Made with sunflower oil, coconut oil, beeswax, jojoba oil, cocoa butter, shea butter and evening primrose oil, our remedy skin is wonderful for lips, face & all over the body.

name: REMEDY EVERYDAY Cleaner - Value pack
description: $34 value for $30. Receive the Remedy Everyday spray and a 1L refill. REMEDY EVERYDAY is an all-purpose surface & floor cleaner. It is perfect for all types of surface cleaning & recommended for hard floors, especially polished timber floorboards. INGREDIENTS: Purified acqua, Certified Organic Plant Grain Alcohol, Decyl glucoside (glucose), Cocoamidopropyl betaine (coconut oil), Cetearyl and Sorbitan olivate (olive oil surfactant) Eucalyptus Bluegum (E. globulus), Methyl glucose dioleate (glucose/thickener). 100% Australian made and owned. Re:use. Re:fill. Re:cycle.

name: REMEDY FOR HANDS - Pump 500ml
description: REMEDY FOR HANDS is a gentle moisturising wash that will leave your hands soft, clean & lightly fragrant. It can also be used as an all over body wash & makes a lovely bubble bath for the little ones. INGREDIENTS: Purified acqua, Decyl glucoside (glucose), Cetearyl and Sorbitan olivate (Olive oil surfactant), Eucalyptus Radiata (E. australiana), Methyl glucose dioleate (glucose/thickener) non-paraben preservative (>0.5%). 100% Australian made and owned. name: REMEDY DISHES - 500ml
description:
REMEDY DISHES is a lightly fragranced dishwashing liquid that leaves your dishes clean, your sink sparkling and your hands soft and smelling great!

Made with Lime Lemon & Lemon Myrtle essential oils.

INGREDIENTS: Decylglucoside (glucose),Cocoa amido propylbetaine (Coconut oil), Glycerine, PEG-120 Methylglucose dioleate (Glucose thickener), Olive Oil PEG-7 Esters (Water soluble lipid), Propylene Glycol (Humectant), Diazolidinyl Urea(Non paraben preservative), Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate (Non paraben preservative), Essential oils of Lime Lemon and Lemon Myrtle.

name: REMEDY 100% Australiana Oil - 100ml
description: Grown in Australia, this oil has a light & fresh aroma, making it gentle enough to use around children & the elderly. It is favoured as a winter rescue oil as well as in bodycare products & cleaning applications. INGREDIENTS: 100% PURE ESSENTIAL OIL 100% Australian made and owned. Re:use. Re:fill. Re:cycle.

name: REMEDY 100% Lemon Gum Oil - 100ml
description: The essential oil of choice for household uses. It has prominent disinfectant, antiseptic, bactericidal, deodorising, fungicidal & insecticidal properties. The fresh lemony scent is one of the best natural deodorants & air fresheners. INGREDIENTS: 100% PURE ESSENTIAL OIL 100% Australian made and owned. Re:use. Re:fill. Re:cycle.

name: REMEDY  100% Peppermint Gum Oil - 100ml
description: A distinctly different fragrance – fresh, camphoraceous, spicy-mint – it has been recommended for all respiratory conditions, muscular soreness, rheumatism, headaches & nervous exhaustion. INGREDIENTS: 100% PURE ESSENTIAL OIL 100% Australian made and owned. Re:use. Re:fill. Re:cycle.

It is favoured for its disinfectant properties & can be used for many cleaning tasks around the home. INGREDIENTS: 100% PURE ESSENTIAL OIL 100% Australian made and owned. Re:use. Re:fill. Re:cycle.
